gui

Class GuiManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.GuiManager

  • public class GuiManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A static class, handling all the GUI's controllers. This is the main Controller between the communication with the server (aka "ClientController") and the GUI (all of the FXML controllers).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GuiManager.SCREENS 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.Map<GuiManager.SCREENS,java.lang.String> availableFXML
      Map between user screen type to FXML path. this not all the paths available - only the necessary here.
      static ClientController client
      our singleton of the client instance.
      static IClient CurrentGuiController
      Will be updated in order to now what screen is shown for the user.
      static int currentYear 
      static boolean dbConnected 
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,GuiManager.SCREENS> userTypeFromString
      Map from string to a type of user screen So we know what homepage to open

      GuiManager()

      static void shutDown()
      A "safe shutdown" function doing logout and closing the connection to the server.
      static void SwitchScene(GuiManager.SCREENS screenEnum, javafx.stage.Stage SeondStage)
      Wherever you need to switch scene (e.g. from login to user screen) this function initial all the needed data and update the "CurrentGuiController"

        public static java.util.Map<GuiManager.SCREENS,java.lang.String> availableFXML

      • SwitchScene

        public static void SwitchScene(GuiManager.SCREENS screenEnum,
                               javafx.stage.Stage SeondStage)
        Wherever you need to switch scene (e.g. from login to user screen) this function initial all the needed data and update the "CurrentGuiController"
        Parameters:
        screenEnum - - the screen you want to switch to from the enum list.
